normalised: Arre yaar, these government schemes for education, na? My cousin got a whole scholarship for his B-Com just because he filled out some form online. They are even giving rupee twenty five thousand for books! Back in my day, we were happy to get a broken bench. Now, kids are swimming in free education, subsidized lunches, and digital tablets. Maybe I should enroll for a P-H-D in "Ancient Memeology" just to grab some benefits. Just kidding (mostly)! Though I still have not received that reimbursement of rupees five hundred I was promised from school for that field trip back in nineteen ninety eight. hmm
